definition: to checkmate (in chess)/to be about to die
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
words of a man on his deathbed always come from the heart (proverb)
pinyin: ren2 zhi1 jiang1 si3 , qi2 yan2 ye3 shan4

sentences.english: When the "king" of one side has no way out, then it is "checkmated".
sentences.chinese: 當一方的“王”無路可走時，成爲被“將死”。

sentences.english: I wouldn't want to deny anyone their dying request.
sentences.chinese: 我無法拒絕接受任何一個將死之人的請求。

sentences.english: The dying animal was found foaming at the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 那隻將死的動物被發現口吐白沫。

sentences.english: NATO and the rebels in Surt have finally checkmated Qaddafi.
sentences.chinese: 北約和蘇爾特的反政府軍終於“將死”了卡扎菲。

sentences.english: So do you hear the echoes of the ones that'll slowly die?
sentences.chinese: 你聽到那些將死之人的回聲了麼？

sentences.english: How can I be reckless with someone who is about to die?
sentences.chinese: 我怎麼可能會對將死之人魯莽行事呢？

sentences.english: Many did not realise until the end that happiness is a choice.
sentences.chinese: 許多人直到將死之時才意識到快樂是個選擇。

sentences.english: If you want to play, then you must die very hard look.
sentences.chinese: 如果你繼續玩的話，你將死得很難看。

sentences.english: I am two moves from checkmating you.
sentences.chinese: 我還有兩步就將死你了。

sentences.english: You do that and I'm a dead duck .
sentences.chinese: 你要這麼着，我就將死了。

sentences.english: The dying man groaned with pain.
sentences.chinese: 那個將死的人因疼痛難忍而哀叫。

sentences.english: His search for a move that would avoid checkmate was unsuccessful.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有找到一步能夠避免被將死的策略。

sentences.english: Patiently a team of horses waited to drag the dead bull out of the ring.
sentences.chinese: 一列馬靜靜地等在一邊將死牛拖出鬥牛場。

sentences.english: I saw her heal a man who should've died.
sentences.chinese: 我看到她救了一個將死之人。

sentences.english: That"s the dying person of wheezing and distress sound."
sentences.chinese: 那是將死之人的喘息和苦難的聲音。
